channel.title: Anti-Dragon shield absorption amount?
channel.description:
I realized that the anti-dragon shields are not abosorbing , so i looked at the file and it shows this...
[code=javascript]Attack bonus 0 0 0 0 0 Defence bonus 7 9 8 2 8 0 Damage absorption 0 0 0 Other bonuses 5 0 0 0 [/code]
Any suggestions what to make the absorptions? Thanks!

item.title: Anti-Dragon shield absorption amount?
item.dc:creator: @Christmas_tree Christmas_tree
item.description:
@Christmas_tree wrote:

You, what, want it to absorb dragon breath?

First, go to the RSWiki and find all the information you need about the bonuses of anti-dragon shields and then paste it here. We’ll establish some code we need to put in to be effective against dragons.

My Skype is below if you wish to add me so I can help you

Read full topic
